text: Amita Suman is a Nepal–born British actress. She is well known as Inej Ghafa in the Netflix series Shadow and Bone. ==Movies== Television and film roles Year Title Role Notes 2018 Casualty Nina Biswas 2 episodes 2018 Ackley Bridge Sameera 1 episode 2018 Doctor Who Umbreen Episode: "Demons of the Punjab" 2019 Daughter Lilah 2019, 2021 The Outpost Naya Recurring role (seasons 2, 4) 2021–present Shadow and Bone Inej Ghafa Main role 2022 The Sandman Nora Special episode Helvellyn Edge Alamo Upcoming film ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births
title: Amita Suman
